'''"It's Only an Eternity of Servitude!"''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[The Temple Where Sand Flows Like Tears]]''.

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is a quote from {{w|Genie (Disney)|Genie}} in {{w|Aladdin (1992 Disney film)|Aladdin}}.
